TopicTitle: mod support in Steam workshop planned?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

i want to ask if it is planed to use the steam-workshop for mods because it is very common for nearly all games supported by steam.

Welcome aboard!

AFAIK this isn't planned, mostly because KSP is sold through outlets other than Steam.
Squad has no interest in Steam Workshop for the foreseeable future. [See here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest).
